name: px2rem-plus
description: Convert px to rem package for Atom. fork from pxrem.

base.title: Default Base
base.description: The base pixel size for px convert to rem. This can be overridden inline.

precision.title: Default Precision
precision.description: The number of digits to the right of the decimal point

leadingZero.title: Preserve Leading Zero
leadingZero.description: Keep the leading zero for converted values < 1. E.g. 0.5rem (preserved) vs .5rem (not preserved)

twoWayConversion.title: Two-way Conversion
twoWayConversion.description: Support to convert rem to px, using the base pixel size, but only in autocomplete.
